definition: delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Progress in different routes of administration and formulations for Hirudin are reviewed.

sentences.english: This drug is available either in liquid or in lyophilized form.

sentences.english: Conclusion The reform of the prescription of the compound Hai Tong Pi bag is successful.

sentences.english: Flexible solid oral dosage forms of medicines are ideal for children.

sentences.english: Conclusion This study would offer foundation of developing orally preparation of Matrine.

sentences.english: New patients treated for PNE with desmopressin should only be prescribed an oral formulation.

sentences.english: This paper is chiefly inquired into how to solve the bubble problem in solvent woodenware coating.
